channel.title: Music – 칠리(chilly)
channel.description: Recent content in 칠리(chilly) on Music

item.title: 칠리(chilly) - Episode 1(feat. Jaeeun)
item.description:
How did you feel the first day you saw me?
Maybe you remember everything
About that day
And you can still smell the scent of that time
How did you feel the first day you saw me?
Maybe you remember everything
About that day
And you can still smell the scent of that time
You drew my starting line in ‘92
And I drew a hideous line on your body too
How painful the scar
Must have been every every night
And then you tried to stop the time
That changed me day by day
But I couldn’t keep your most beautiful days
My beginning was not special at all
I fought a lot with my bro in a small house
And I cried whenever I had time
That’s how I tore your heart
What you always said to me
You don’t have to be rich
But your mind should be rich
That brought me all this way
And saved me many times
I’m gonna live with that word
In my head remembering you
How did you feel the first day you saw me?
Maybe you remember everything
About that day
And you can still smell the scent of that time
How did you feel the first day you saw me?
Maybe you remember everything
About that day
And you can still smell the scent of that time
I’m becoming you before I know it
But unlike you I still feel like a child
Maybe I’ll never be like you
I really want to tell you
If I could live another life
I’d like to start over with you
I’m becoming you before I know it
But unlike you I still feel like a child
Maybe I’ll never be like you
I really want to tell you
If I could live another life
I’d like to start over with you
